case_name_full: The People of the State of New York v. Casey A. Jefferson, Also Known as Casey Riggins

opinions.opinion_text:
Appeal from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Monroe County (Francis A. Affronti, J.), rendered October 13, 2009. The judgment convicted defendant, upon his plea of guilty, of robbery in the first degree.
It is hereby ordered that the judgment so appealed from is unanimously affirmed. Present — Scudder, BJ., Centra, Garni, Sconiers and Whalen, JJ.

court_short_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York
court_full_name: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
